regex.name: makelist2
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/53.0.2785.143 m Safari/537.36

regex.name: catcher
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction import urllib import requests import re import sys import base64 import urlparse import json
def GetLSProData(page_data, Cookie_Jar, m, ref='http://www.stadium-live.biz/[makelist2.param1]'): print 'stadium_py: ', ref ua = 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/53.0.2785.143 m Safari/537.36' hdrs = {'Referer':ref, 'User-Agent':ua} try: match = re.findall(r'iframe\s+src="(ch_.*?)"', page_data) pge = match[0] print 'stadium_py: ' + pge html = requests.get('http://www.stadium-live.biz/' + pge, headers=hdrs).text match = re.findall(r'src="(http://.*?file=\d*)&', html) pge = match[0] host = urlparse.urlparse(pge).scheme + '://' + urlparse.urlparse(pge).netloc + '/' html = requests.get(pge + r'&width=800&height=450&autostart=true', headers=hdrs).text match = re.findall(r'iframe.*?"(http://.*/\S*)"', html) pge = match[0] html = requests.get(pge, headers=hdrs).text #print html vars = re.findall(r'(?s)ajax.*v_cod1:\s*(\w+).*v_cod2:\s*(\w+).*url:\s*(\w+)', html) if vars and len(vars[0]) > 2: cod1 = re.search(vars[0][0] + r'.*?["\'](.+?)["\']', html).group(1) cod2 = re.search(vars[0][1] + r'.*?["\'](.+?)["\']', html).group(1) uri = re.search(vars[0][2] + r'.*?["\'](.+?)["\']', html).group(1)
else: vars =re.findall(r"(?s)function\s+\w+\(\)\{\s*\w+\s*=\s*document.getElementById\('([^']+).*?\w+\s*=\s*document.getElementById\('([^']+).*?\w+\s*=\s*document.getElementById\('([^']+).*?\w+\s*=\s*document.getElementById\('([^']+)", html) #print 'stadium_py: ' #print vars if vars and len(vars[0]) > 3: cod1 = re.findall('input\s+type="hidden"\s+id="' + vars[0][0] + '" value="(.*?)"', html)[0] cod2 = re.findall('input\s+type="hidden"\s+id="' + vars[0][1] + '" value="(.*?)"', html)[0] uri = re.findall('input\s+type="hidden"\s+id="' + vars[0][3] + '" value="(.*?)"', html)[0]
uri = host + base64.b64decode(uri) + '?callback=jQuery&v_cod1=' + urllib.quote_plus(cod1) + '&v_cod2=' + urllib.quote_plus(cod2) data = requests.get(uri, headers=hdrs).text streamer = re.findall(r'(http.*?m3u8)', data)[0] streamer = streamer.replace('\\', '')
return urllib.quote_plus(streamer + '|Referer=' + urllib.quote_plus(pge) + '&User-Agent=' + urllib.quote_plus(ua))
except Exception as e: print 'stadium_py: ' + str(e.message) return "http://no.stream.found"
